title: Verify validation message for password that is not containing uppercase letters
testName: Account Registration.... Verify validation message for password that is not containing uppercase letters
testError: Timed out retrying: expected '<div.note.form-error>' to contain 'Passwords must have at least one uppercase (\'A\'-\'Z\').'
testCommands: page load --waiting for new page to load--
assert expected **<div.note.form-error>** to contain **Passwords must have at least one uppercase (**'A'**-**'Z'**).**
